  • From Bucket-Jo to Banjo - Part 1

    January 1, 2025

    I was 16 years old, sitting in shop class, and had just finished counting how many board feet of red oak lumber the teacher had brought. The next task was building something with it. For most students, it was standard shop-class projects – picture frames, cutting boards, and jewelry boxes. For me, it was the spark I needed to start...
